forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a gentle sun, casting a soft glow across the urban landscape, where the skyline reaches gracefully into the azure sky. With temperatures poised to hover around a delightful 72 degrees, this is the sort of day that invites you to step outside and bask in the warmth before the afternoon chill settles in. The light breezes whisper from the southwest, adding a subtle freshness to the air, enhancing the allure of the day. With mostly clear skies overhead, any remnants of fog that sometimes embrace the Golden Gate Bridge are but faint whispers, lingering in the distance but too timid to encroach upon this splendid afternoon.

As the evening approaches, temperatures are expected to dip to around 53 degrees, a reminder of the cool coastal air typical of this region. It’s wise to don layers—a lightweight sweater or jacket would serve you well, especially if you plan to linger into the twilight hours, when the city transforms and evening lights sparkle like stars reflected on water. The conditions are perfect for a stroll along the waterfront or a leisurely lunch at an outdoor café, where you can savor the simple pleasure of good food and people-watching, immersing yourself in the vibrant pulse of the city. With day draping slowly into night, consider wrapping up with a quiet moment at a park, allowing the calm to wash over you, indulging in life’s little moments of tranquility amid the bustling charm of San Francisco.
